colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES MDO SNGAGS MTHA' DAG GI LAM GYI SROG SHING BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ^BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB MING CAN GYIS RANG DANG RANG GI SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS KHA TON DU MA 'CHAG PAR BYA BA'I CHED DU, 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS SKOR DANG, BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DNGOS GRUB BANG MDZOD SOGS GZHIR BYAS TE SBYAR BA'O, ,) 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
author_simple: BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB MING CAN,
